20101208085353.727|20101208085354.636|CCO|        
20101208085354.636|20101208085355.545|CCO|              Great news!
20101208085355.545|20101208085356.455|CCO|    
20101208085356.455|20101208085357.364|CCO|        For people with COPD,
20101208085357.364|20101208085358.273|CCO|
20101208085358.273|20101208085359.182|CCO|    including chronic bronchitis,
20101208085359.182|20101208085400.091|CCO|    
20101208085400.091|20101208085401.000|CCO|          emphysema, or both,
20101208085401.000|20101208085401.667|CCO|      ADVAIR helps significantly
20101208085401.667|20101208085402.333|CCO|    
20101208085402.333|20101208085403.000|CCO|      improve lung function.
20101208085403.000|20101208085403.667|CCO|  While nothing can reverse COPD,
20101208085403.667|20101208085404.333|CCO|    ADVAIR is different from most
20101208085404.333|20101208085405.000|CCO|    
20101208085405.000|20101208085405.667|CCO|      other COPD medications
20101208085405.667|20101208085406.333|CCO|    
20101208085406.333|20101208085407.000|CCO|          because it contains
20101208085407.000|20101208085407.667|CCO|    
20101208085407.667|20101208085408.333|CCO|    both an anti-inflammatory
20101208085408.333|20101208085409.000|CCO|        
20101208085409.000|20101208085409.667|CCO|        and a long-acting
20101208085409.667|20101208085410.333|CCO|        
20101208085410.333|20101208085411.000|CCO|          bronchodilator,
20101208085411.000|20101208085411.833|CCO|        
20101208085411.833|20101208085412.667|CCO|        working together
20101208085412.667|20101208085413.500|CCO|
20101208085413.500|20101208085414.333|CCO|      to help you breathe better.
20101208085414.333|20101208085415.167|CCO|ADVAIR won't replace fast-acting
20101208085415.167|20101208085416.000|CCO|
20101208085416.000|20101208085416.833|CCO|    inhalers for sudden symptoms
20101208085416.833|20101208085417.667|CCO|        
20101208085417.667|20101208085418.500|CCO|        and should not be
20101208085418.500|20101208085419.333|CCO|
20101208085419.333|20101208085420.167|CCO|      used more than twice a day.
20101208085420.167|20101208085421.000|CCO|  People with COPD taking ADVAIR
20101208085421.000|20101208085421.556|CCO|    
20101208085421.556|20101208085422.111|CCO|    may have a higher chance
20101208085422.111|20101208085422.667|CCO|        
20101208085422.667|20101208085423.222|CCO|            of pneumonia.
20101208085423.222|20101208085423.778|CCO|

20101208085424.333|20101208085424.889|CCO|    
20101208085424.889|20101208085425.444|CCO|    your risk of osteoporosis
20101208085425.444|20101208085426.000|CCO|
